alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:02PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Franklin, northwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Troy, New Hampshire to near South Hadley, Massachusetts. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Amherst, Orange, Gardner, South Hadley, Belchertown, Athol, Winchendon, Ware, Templeton, Rutland, Westminster, Granby, Ashburnham, Barre, Hadley, Warren, North Brookfield, Hubbardston and West Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
